COMMAND.name: sfsd
COMMAND.DETAIL: SeemlessStack file system is a distributed file system with two main components: - sfs - sfsd Each sfs manages one or more sfsds which are distributed over LAN/WAN. Each sfsd manages the chunk domain consistsing of chunks. This CLI specifies sfsd location to sfs."

PARAM.name: ipaddr
PARAM.help: IP address of the node hosting sfsd

PARAM.name: port
PARAM.help: Port number on which sfsd listens
